SEC. 11. REPORTS. The Commission will release an interim report for public comment within 1 year of the Act's enactment, and a final report to Congress within 2 years of its first meeting, containing findings, conclusions, recommendations, and individual opinions of Commission members. The Commission will submit a final report to Congress within 2 years of its first meeting, including agreed items, dissenting opinions with explanations, and consideration of public comments.
